repnme.cdata!:
Algeria - Second National Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Second National Water
            Supply and Sewerage Project for Algeria are as follows:
            outcome of the project was unsatisfactory, performance of
            the Bank was rated unsatisfactory, and the performance of
            the Borrower was rated as satisfactory. Some of the lessons
            learned from the project are: a) the outcome of this project
            suggests that the design was flawed from the beginning. The
            components were too large and complex, and too difficult to
            implement and manage given the institutional capacity in the
            country. In addition, Algeria's attempts at sector
            reform lacked political will at the time of project
            implementation. In the future, necessary sector reforms
            should be in place before projects are approved and
            implemented; b) urban water supply projects should not be
            supported by the Bank without proper commitment of the
            Borrower to carry out their objectives within a clear
            strategic framework for sector development. Therefore,
            future lending in the sector should be directly linked to
            the implementation performance of ongoing projects; and c)
            the Bank should be proactive in problem solving as part of
            its supervision, and should mobilize teams with a high level
            of expertise and experience to assist the Borrower with
            difficult issues. When appropriate, these issues should
            receive active input from Bank management. The availability
            of such resources and commitment by the Bank will help the
            Borrower to achieve much-needed success in projects in this sector.

repnme.cdata!:
Algeria - Second National Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

abstracts.cdata!:
This project is part of the national
            water supply and sewerage sector investment program included
            in the Second Five Year Development Plan. It is intended to
            provide for the development of four water supply and three
            sewerage subprojects. A further objective would be to help
            expand water production, treatment and transmission to meet
            the unsatisfied and future water demands of areas served by
            five regional water companies, and to help expand the
            distribution systems of areas served by all thirteen
            regional water supply companies. Finally, technical
            assistance would be provided to water sector entities and to
            the sector's portion of the local construction industry.

docna.cdata!:
Algeria - Second National Water Supply and
            Sewerage Project

Algeria - Second National Water
            Supply and Sewerage Project
